item.title: Linux - install gogole chrome in debian Linux
item.description: Linux - install gogole chrome in debian Linux wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | sudo apt-key add - sudo sh -c 'echo "deb http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list' sudo apt-get update sudo apt-get install google-chrome-stable refer - How to install Chrome browser properly via command line?
